flawed_nl_solution:
If Danielle drives at three times the speed of Cameron, it will take Cameron 30*3=<<30*3=90>>90 minutes for Cameron to travel the same distance.
And since Cameron drives at twice the speed of his brother, Chase, it will take Chase 90*2=<<90*2=108>>108 minutes to travel from Granville to Salisbury.
#### 108

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 108. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
